tier.item: (16a) No intiend-o la facilidad de los extranjeros
NEG understand-1sg the ease of the foreigners
para llamar-se unos a otros sin asomo de temor,
for call-RR ones to others without sign of fear
lo cual no sólo es una falta de respecto,
the which NEG only is a lack of respect
`I don't understand the ease with which foreigners address each other
without any sign of fear, whichis not only a lack of respet, but can also occasion
grave dangers.' (Isabel Allende, Los cuentos de Eva Luna: Walimai)

tier.item: (30) Abal su alemile abal ta gibl-in igin
GOL woman two be.standing:SEQ woman one head-3 hair-3
abal ta kwi abal ta gibl-in igin aato-n-g-w-e
woman one in.return woman one head-3 hair-3 touch-3-Ass-3-Dist
`Two women are touching each other's hair.'
Literally: `two women are standing and one woman touches her hair and then in
return one woman touches her back.'
